hpfm_lov_value_tl hlvt LEFT JOIN hpfm_lov_value hlv ON hlvt.lov_value_id = hlv.lov_value_id WHERE hlv.lov_code = 'SSRC.SOURCE_CATEGORY' AND hlv.`value` = srh.source_category AND hlvt.lang = #{lang} ) ShortListCategory, ( SELECT hlvt.meaning FROM hpfm_lov_value_tl hlvt LEFT JOIN hpfm_lov_value hlv ON hlvt.lov_value_id = hlv.lov_value_id WHERE hlv.lov_code = 'SPCM.CONTRACT.KIND' AND hlv.`value` = srh.attribute_varchar9 AND hlvt.lang = #{lang} ) AttributeVarchar9, '单标段' SectionNumber, ( SELECT hlvt.meaning FROM hpfm_lov_value_tl hlvt LEFT JOIN hpfm_lov_value hlv ON hlvt.lov_value_id = hlv.lov_value_id WHERE hlv.lov_code = 'RCWL_RFX_DBFS' AND hlv.`value` = srh.attribute_varchar16 AND hlvt.lang = #{lang} ) AttributeVarchar11, (select t.real_name from iam_user t where t.id = srh.checked_by) CheckedBy, ROUND( srh.attribute_decimal10, 2 ) AttributeVarchar12, NULL RoundNumber, ( SELECT hlvt.meaning FROM hpfm_lov_value_tl hlvt LEFT JOIN hpfm_lov_value hlv ON hlvt.lov_value_id = hlv.lov_value_id WHERE hlv.lov_code = 'SSRC.RCWL.BID_EVAL_METHOD' AND hlv.`value` = srh.attribute_varchar17 AND hlvt.lang = #{lang} )MethodRemark, srh.technology_weight BusinessWeight, srh.business_weight TechnologyWeight, DATE_FORMAT(srh.attribute_datetime3, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AttributeDateTime10, DATE_FORMAT(srh.attribute_datetime4, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') QuotationStartDate, DATE_FORMAT(srh.attribute_datetime5, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AttributeDateTime11, DATE_FORMAT(srh.attribute_datetime6, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') QuotationEndDate, DATE_FORMAT(srh.attribute_datetime7, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AttributeDateTime12, srh.attribute_bigint2 AttributeVarchar13, srh.attribute_varchar11 AttributeVarchar14, srh.pur_name PurchaserName, srh.pur_phone PurchaserPhone, srh.attribute_varchar12 AttributeVarchar15, srh.bid_bond BidBond, srh.attribute_varchar13 AttributeVarchar16, srh.attribute_varchar14 AttributeVarchar17, srh.attribute_varchar15 AttributeVarchar18, (select t.real_name from iam_user t where t.id = srh.attribute_varchar18) AttributeVarchar19 FROM ssrc_rfx_header srh where srh.tenant_id = #{organizationId} and srh.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeader.rfxHeaderId}

SELECT i.real_name ExpertName, i.phone ExpertPhone, ( SELECT hlvt.meaning FROM hpfm_lov_value_tl hlvt LEFT JOIN hpfm_lov_value hlv ON hlvt.lov_value_id = hlv.lov_value_id WHERE hlv.lov_code = 'SSRC.EXPERT_DUTY' AND hlv.`value` = see.evaluate_leader_flag AND hlvt.lang = #{lang} ) ExpertCategoryMeaning FROM ssrc_evaluate_expert see left JOIN iam_user i ON i.organization_id = see.tenant_id AND i.id = see.expert_user_id where source_from = 'RFX' and source_header_id = #{rfxHeader.rfxHeaderId} and tenant_id = #{organizationId}

SELECT hc.company_num SupplierCompanyNum, hc.company_name SupplierCompanyName, ( SELECT scb.registered_capital FROM spfm_company_basic scb WHERE scb.company_id = hc.source_key ORDER BY scb.object_version_number LIMIT 1 ) RegisteredCapital, ( SELECT t.real_name FROM iam_user t WHERE t.id = srls.supplier_contact_id ) ContactName, ( SELECT t.phone FROM iam_user t WHERE t.id = srls.supplier_contact_id ) ContactMobilePhone FROM ssrc_rfx_line_supplier srls LEFT JOIN hpfm_company hc ON hc.company_id = srls.supplier_company_id AND hc.tenant_id = srls.supplier_tenant_id where srls.tenant_id = #{organizationId} and srls.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeader.rfxHeaderId}

SELECT srli.rfx_line_item_num RfxLineItemNum, srli.item_code ItemCode, srli.item_name ItemName, srli.specs UomId, ( SELECT sic.category_name FROM smdm_item_category sic WHERE sic.category_id = srli.item_category_id ) ItemCategoryName, srli.rfx_quantity rfxQuanttity, ( SELECT uom_name FROM hpfm_uom hu WHERE hu.uom_id = srli.uom_id ) UomId1 FROM ssrc_rfx_line_item srli LEFT JOIN smdm_item si ON si.item_id = srli.item_id where srli.tenant_id = #{organizationId} and srli.rfx_header_id = #{rfxHeader.rfxHeaderId}
